original_text: From every part of the earth, we hear songs. People sing to praise the Righteous One. But I say, ‘I have become very weak and thin! It will be very bad for me! Evil people are turning against their friends. They deceive people more and more!’ From every part of the earth, we hear songs. People sing to praise the Righteous One.
korean_text: 땅 끝에서부터 노래하는 소리가 우리에게 들리기를 의로우신 이에게 영광을 돌리세 하도다 그러나 나는 이르기를 나는 쇠잔하였고 나는 쇠잔하였으니 내게 화가 있도다 배신자들은 배신하고 배신자들이 크게 배신하였도다

sentences.original_text: From every part of the earth, we hear songs.
sentences.korean_translation: 땅의 모든 곳에서 우리는 노래를 듣습니다.

sentences.original_text: People sing to praise the Righteous One.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 의로운 분을 찬양하기 위해 노래합니다.

sentences.original_text: I have become very weak and thin!
It will be very bad for me!
sentences.korean_translation: 내게 매우 나쁜 일이 생길 것입니다!

sentences.original_text: Evil people are turning against their friends.
They deceive people more and more!
From every part of the earth, we hear songs.
sentences.korean_translation: 땅의 모든 곳에서 우리는 노래를 듣습니다.

sentences.original_text: People sing to praise the Righteous One.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 의로운 분을 찬양하기 위해 노래합니다.
